name: Thumper Jumper
description:
Tap the arrows to move Thumper to either side and collect carrots in this infinite-scrolling-jumper! Only worry about moving, while Thumper does all the jumping for you! Every carrot you collect is one point, and those rare and seemingly random gold carrots yield 5 points.

How many carrots can you collect?

Ethan Moore's Apps:

-Thumper Jumper
-Annoying Whale
